conclusion: The refractive index of the prism glass is \( n = \sqrt{2} \), and the angle of incidence (\( \gamma \)) is \( 45^\circ \).
The angle of refraction (\( \gamma' \)) can be calculated using the formula: \( \gamma' = \gamma - n \cdot \gamma \).
Substituting the given values into the formula: \( \gamma' = 45^\circ - \sqrt{2} \cdot 45^\circ \).
The calculation for \( \gamma' \) is repeated multiple times without further progress: \( \gamma' = 45^\circ - 45^\circ \sqrt{2} \).
